授業目的: 本講義の目的は、学生が科学技術の発見を社会的・経済的価値を生み出す製品やサービスに変換するために必要な知識を獲得し、応用できるようになることである。[Translated by DeepL]
到達目標: コース終了時には、自然科学から生まれた斬新なアイデアをもとに、革新的な成果につながるビジネスを生み出すプロセスを学ぶことができる。[Translated by DeepL]
授業の概要・背景: The talent who understand entrepreneurship, science and technology has become increasingly valuable in today's global market. This course, which is unlike business school courses, is designed to ensure that students from science and technology backgrounds can acquire the business knowledge necessary for the creation of social and economic values through innovation which can develop into a promising business plan.
授業方法: Lecture topic: Global EntrepreneurshipLecture handouts will be distributed in the classroom and explained using PowerPoint slides. Students are encouraged to hold questions and discussions during class.
